headlines.title: AI as a Game Master: Generated Playable Worlds
headlines.description: How to use LLMs to build a playable world as a text adventure game with a solvable mystery.

headlines.title: Why Engineers Hate PM's: The Glue Engineer
headlines.description: Not all engineering work fits in a roadmap. Some of it holds the roadmap together.

headlines.title: Building a language to fix messy CSVs
headlines.description: How I built a functional programming language to import any csv to a fixed data model.

headlines.title: Making a blog...the hard way
headlines.description: Why and how I built my own blog from scratch.

headlines.title: AI and the Barrier of Entry
headlines.description: We are witnessing the next major wave of technological innovation. And it's never been easier to be a part of it.
